search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Zoho Survey (zoho-survey.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page URL for Zoho Survey is: [https://www.zoho.com/survey/pricing.html](https://www.zoho.com/survey/pricing.html)【3:1†source】.

citations.title: Zoho Survey: Maximize Your Survey Efficiency with an All-in-One Solution

extracted_content.content:

### Includes everything in Basic +

*   Unlimited responsesUnlimited responses

*   Zoho Sheet integrationIntegrate your survey response data with Zoho Sheet for additional analysis.
*   Purchase responsesGet responses from an audience that matches your survey criteria.
*   SMS DistributionYou can set up automated SMS to share survey links and collect feedback from anywhere, at any time.
*   Customizable reportsCreate reports with custom formatting, trend analysis, cross-tabulation, and filtering options.
*   ScoringAdd scores to your answer choices and use them to evaluate survey responses.
*   Cross-tab ReportsAnalyze survey data by comparing different variables simultaneously, revealing correlations and relationships.[Learn more](https://help.zoho.com/portal/en/kb/survey/reports/cross-tab-report/articles/cross-tab-report)
*   Trend reportsObserve patterns and changes over time in survey responses, identifying evolving trends and preferences.[Learn more](https://help.zoho.com/portal/en/kb/survey/reports/trend-report/articles/trend-report)
*   Schedule reportsSchedule and export reports based on your availability for planned data retrieval.[Learn more](https://help.zoho.com/portal/en/kb/survey/reports/schedule-report/articles/schedule-report)
*   Custom reportsTailor survey data presentation with personalized layouts and visualizations to focus on specific insights and key metrics.[Learn more](https://help.zoho.com/portal/en/kb/survey/reports/custom-report/articles/custom-report)
*   NPSEvaluate customer loyalty with this industry-standard metric, indicating how likely customers are to recommend your brand.[Learn more](https://help.zoho.com/portal/en/kb/survey/survey-builder/question-types/net-promoter-score/articles/net-promoter-score)
*   CSATMeasure your customer satisfaction effectively using this metric and gauge the overall satisfaction of your customers. [Learn more](https://help.zoho.com/portal/en/kb/survey/reports/csat-score/articles/csat-score)
*   CESCustomers' ease of use of your product or service can be measured with CES.
